intro.title: Convert Hourly Wages to Annual Salary
intro.description: Easily convert your hourly wage to annual salary equivalent. Compare compensation between hourly and salaried positions.

faqs.question: How do I calculate annual salary from hourly wage?
faqs.answer: Multiply your hourly rate by hours worked per week, then multiply by weeks worked per year. For example: $25 × 40 × 52 = $52,000 annual salary.

faqs.question: Is overtime included in the calculation?
faqs.answer: You can choose to include overtime calculations. Overtime hours are paid at 1.5x your regular rate.

faqs.question: What's better: hourly or salaried?
faqs.answer: It depends on your situation. Hourly positions offer overtime pay, while salaried positions typically include benefits and paid time off.

faqs.question: How does this affect taxes?
faqs.answer: Both hourly and salaried income are taxed the same way. The main difference is in tax withholding and benefit calculations.
